name: VR JAPAN
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese space in VR for about 3 minutes..
This is a doorway connecting familiar Japanese scenery (alley, subway corridor, Japanese-style room, and temple).
There is not much interactivity, so you can't grab things at the moment. Only teleportation move is supported.
Enjoy a 3-minute walk in Japan!

Future plans:
Optional Smooth continuous teleport.
(Current: only teleport to target position.)
